List transactions by coin

Source: R/listby_coin.R
listby_coin.Rd

Provides a list of transactions, separated by coin..

Usage

listby_coin(formatted.ACB)

Arguments

formatted.ACB

The dataframe

Examples

all.data <- format_shakepay(data_shakepay)
formatted.ACB <- format_ACB(all.data)
#> Process started at 2023-02-10 23:22:26. Please be patient as the transactions process.
#> [Formatting ACB (progress bar repeats for each coin)...]
#> Note: Adjusted cost base (ACB) and capital gains have been adjusted for the superficial loss rule. To avoid this, use argument `sup.loss = FALSE`.
#> Process ended at 2023-02-10 23:22:26. Total time elapsed: 0.01 minutes
listby_coin(formatted.ACB)
